summary: Proto3-json-serializer dependency added to common package increases workflow bundle size from 0.75MB to 0.86MB. Create a new shared package for code and dependencies not used in workflow package to reduce bundle size.
userImpact: Users experience larger workflow bundles due to unnecessary dependencies being included, affecting deployment and runtime performance.
rootCause: proto3-json-serializer dependency added to common package is not used in workflow but gets included in the bundle.
proposedFix: Create a new shared package for code and dependencies not required by the workflow package.
resolutionDetails: Issue was closed, indicating the shared package was created to separate workflow-specific and non-workflow code.
keyQuote: Create a new package for shared code and deps that are not used in `workflow` package in order to reduce workflow bundle size.
